SEARCH
Package com.platform.user.internal

Interface UserRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,UUID>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<User,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<User,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,UUID>
@Repository public interface UserRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,UUID>
Repository interface for User entity operations. Supports both OAuth2 and password authentication with multi-tenant organization isolation.

  • Method Details

    • findByEmailAndOrganizationIdAndDeletedAtIsNull

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.email.value = :email AND u.organization.id = :organizationId AND u.deletedAt IS NULL") Optional<User> findByEmailAndOrganizationIdAndDeletedAtIsNull(@Param("email") String email, @Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId)
      Find user by email and organization (excluding soft-deleted users) Multi-tenant aware - same email can exist in different organizations

    • findByEmailAcrossOrganizations

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.email.value = :email AND u.deletedAt IS NULL") List<User> findByEmailAcrossOrganizations(@Param("email") String email)
      Find users by email across all organizations (for admin purposes)

    • findByProviderAndProviderId

      Optional<User> findByProviderAndProviderId(String provider, String providerId)
      Find user by OAuth provider and provider ID

    • findByEmail

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.email.value = :email") List<User> findByEmail(@Param("email") String email)
      Find user by email (including soft-deleted for admin purposes)

    • findByEmailAndOrganizationId

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.email.value = :email AND u.organization.id = :organizationId") Optional<User> findByEmailAndOrganizationId(@Param("email") String email, @Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId)
      Find user by email and organization (including soft-deleted)

    • findAllActive

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.deletedAt IS NULL ORDER BY u.createdAt DESC") List<User> findAllActive()
      Find all active users (not soft-deleted)

    • findByDeletedAtIsNull

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.deletedAt IS NULL") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<User> findByDeletedAtIsNull(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Find all active users with pagination

      List<User> findByProviderAndDeletedAtIsNull(String provider)
      Find users by provider

    • findUsersCreatedBetween

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.createdAt BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate AND u.deletedAt IS NULL") List<User> findUsersCreatedBetween(@Param("startDate") Instant startDate, @Param("endDate") Instant endDate)
      Find users created within a date range

    • countActiveUsers

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(u) FROM User u WHERE u.deletedAt IS NULL") long countActiveUsers()
      Count active users

    • countUsersByProvider

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(u) FROM User u WHERE u.provider = :provider AND u.deletedAt IS NULL") long countUsersByProvider(@Param("provider") String provider)
      Count users by provider

    • findByPreference

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM users u WHERE (u.preferences::jsonb) ->> :preferenceKey = :value AND u.deleted_at IS NULL", nativeQuery=true) List<User> findByPreference(@Param("preferenceKey") String preferenceKey, @Param("value") String value)
      Find users with specific preference

    • existsByEmailAndOrganizationIdAndDeletedAtIsNull

      @Query("SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(u) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END FROM User u WHERE u.email.value = :email AND u.organization.id = :organizationId AND u.deletedAt IS NULL") boolean existsByEmailAndOrganizationIdAndDeletedAtIsNull(@Param("email") String email, @Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId)
      Check if email exists in organization (excluding soft-deleted)

    • findByNameContainingIgnoreCase

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE LOWER(u.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', :namePattern, \'%\')) AND u.deletedAt IS NULL") List<User> findByNameContainingIgnoreCase(@Param("namePattern") String namePattern)
      Find users by display name pattern (case-insensitive)

    • softDeleteUser

      @Query("UPDATE User u SET u.deletedAt = :deletedAt WHERE u.id = :userId") void softDeleteUser(@Param("userId") UUID userId, @Param("deletedAt") Instant deletedAt)
      Soft delete user by setting deletedAt timestamp

    • restoreUser

      @Query("UPDATE User u SET u.deletedAt = NULL WHERE u.id = :userId") void restoreUser(@Param("userId") UUID userId)
      Restore soft-deleted user

    • findByProviderIn

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.provider IN :providers AND u.deletedAt IS NULL") List<User> findByProviderIn(@Param("providers") List<String> providers)
      Find users by multiple providers

    • findRecentlyActive

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.updatedAt >= :since AND u.deletedAt IS NULL ORDER BY u.updatedAt DESC") List<User> findRecentlyActive(@Param("since") Instant since)
      Find recently active users (based on updatedAt)

    • findAllByEmailForDataExport

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.email.value = :email") List<User> findAllByEmailForDataExport(@Param("email") String email)
      Custom method to find users for GDPR data export

    • findByPasswordResetToken

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.passwordResetToken = :token AND u.deletedAt IS NULL") Optional<User> findByPasswordResetToken(@Param("token") String token)
      Find user by password reset token

    • findByEmailVerificationToken

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.emailVerificationToken = :token AND u.deletedAt IS NULL") Optional<User> findByEmailVerificationToken(@Param("token") String token)
      Find user by email verification token

    • findUsersWithPasswordAuth

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u JOIN u.authenticationMethods am WHERE am = \'PASSWORD\' AND u.deletedAt IS NULL") List<User> findUsersWithPasswordAuth()
      Find users with password authentication method

    • countUnverifiedUsers

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(u) FROM User u WHERE u.emailVerified = false AND u.deletedAt IS NULL") long countUnverifiedUsers()
      Count users with email verification pending

    • findLockedUsers

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.lockoutExpiresAt > :currentTime AND u.deletedAt IS NULL") List<User> findLockedUsers(@Param("currentTime") Instant currentTime)
      Find locked users (account lockout)

    • searchUsersInOrganization

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.organization.id = :organizationId AND (LOWER(u.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', :searchTerm, \'%\')) OR LOWER(u.email.value) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', :searchTerm, \'%\'))) AND u.deletedAt IS NULL ORDER BY u.name") List<User> searchUsersInOrganization(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId, @Param("searchTerm") String searchTerm, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Search users by name or email within organization

    • findByOrganizationId

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.organization.id = :organizationId AND u.deletedAt IS NULL ORDER BY u.createdAt DESC") List<User> findByOrganizationId(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId)
      Find users by organization

    • findByEmailAndDeletedAtIsNull

      @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.email.value = :email AND u.deletedAt IS NULL") Optional<User> findByEmailAndDeletedAtIsNull(@Param("email") String email)
      Find user by email (single result, excluding soft-deleted) Legacy method compatibility - used by SessionService and UserService

    • existsByEmailAndDeletedAtIsNull

      @Query("SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(u) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END FROM User u WHERE u.email.value = :email AND u.deletedAt IS NULL") boolean existsByEmailAndDeletedAtIsNull(@Param("email") String email)
      Check if email exists (excluding soft-deleted) - legacy compatibility
